title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 625 - Events And Situations That Are Not Under The Auspices Of An Agency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 625 - Events And Situations That Are Not Under The Auspices Of An Agency

State Regulations
§ 625.1 - Applicability
§ 625.2 - Definitions
§ 625.3 - Agency involvement in events or situations that are not under the auspices of an agency
§ 625.4 - OPWDD involvement in events or situations that are not under the auspices of the agency
§ 625.5 - Agency and OPWDD involvement in deaths that are not under the auspices of the agency

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 625

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§13.07, 13.09[b], 16.00; L. 2012, ch. 501

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
